tooltips.debug_info: デバッグインフォーメーション

create.a: Components may be dragged from the toolbox and dropped into the Stage

selection.q: Selecting components (so you can rotate them)
selection.a: Click a component in the grid to 'Select'. Clicking the same element again toggles the selection. You may also click the 'Clear selection' button on the right toolbar for the same result.

removal.q: Removing a component from the layout
removal.a: Double_click a component to remove it from the layout grid.

rotation.a: Select a component and click on either of the 'rotate' buttons to rotate the tiles. Click 'Reset' to restore to original position.

validation.a: Click the 'Validate' button to validate the layout.

clear_validation.a: Click the 'Clear selection/validation results' button on the right toolbar.

restart.a: Click the 'Clear' button to clear an existing layout.

debug.title: Debug Console
debug.instruction: Please copy the following info and send it to the developer along with a screenshot of the layout
